structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Sale Of Mercury Added Thermostats And Other Mercury Added Products

text.section: No person shall sell or offer to sell or distribute a mercury-added thermostat in the commonwealth.
No person shall sell or offer to sell or distribute in the commonwealth the following mercury-added products:
esophageal dilators, bourgie tubes or gastrointestinal tubes;

Subsections (a) and (b) shall not apply: (i) to the sale of mercury-added products if the use of the product is a federal requirement; (ii) to the sale of thermometers if they are determined to be medically necessary by a licensed physician or are ordered by prescription, or (iii) to the sale of mercury-added antique barometers, including antique barometers with attached mercury thermometers, if the barometer was manufactured prior to 1955.
